name: Everlasting Summer: Alyona's story
description:
Alena's story is another piece from the fashion designer "Seven Days of Summer". The old name is “Micromod about Sad-chan”. The mod is a ten-day kinetic story describing Semyon's possible relationship with Tikhonova's sister Lena, Alena.

Alyona is a Very Strange Girl, whom we have to understand and try to survive next to her. She loves her collection of pebbles, the moon and mock Semyon.

Technically, this is a linear narrative with a single fork in the sixth day, each choice leading to a different ending.
